simplesect.title: BSDDATE, R_BSDDATE, S_BSDDATE
simplesect.para: Description: Date of the message in BSD timestamp format (month/day/hour/minute/second, each expressed in two digits). This is the original syslog time stamp without year information, for example Jun 13 15:58:00. If possible, it is recommended to use ISODATE for timestamping.
